results.title: Regulation of p38 mitogen-activated kinase-mediated fetal membrane senescence by statins.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Progesterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011374 @@@Progesterone@@@ did not reduce OS-induced fetal membrane senescence and SASP. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ may reduce the incidences of OS-associated @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@PTB@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Preterm_Premature_Rupture_of_the_Membranes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563032 @@@pPROM@@@ by preventing premature senescence and SASP.

citations.NLM: Ayad MT, Taylor BD, Menon R. Regulation of p38 mitogen-activated kinase-mediated fetal membrane senescence by statins. Am J Reprod Immunol. 2018 Oct;80(4):e12999. PMID: 29911323
